short_summary: Janitorial services contract at Churchill Airport
description: Janitorial services contract at Churchill Airport. Duration: April 1, 2023 to March 31, 2024
full_summary:
==========================

**Title:** Janitorial Services, Churchill, Manitoba
**Title:** Services de nettoyage et d'entretien ménager, Churchill, Manitoba

**Solicitation #:** T5013-220263
**Reference #:** PW-23-01023734

**Notice:** This is a **Request for Proposal** (RFP) for the provision of janitorial services and supervision at the Churchill Airport in Churchill, Manitoba. The successful bidder will be responsible for providing all necessary labor and supervision for a period of 12 months, commencing April 1, 2023, and concluding on March 31, 2024.

**Location:** Churchill, Manitoba, Canada
**Region(s) of Operation:** Manitoba
**Region(s) of Delivery:** Manitoba

**Contracting Entity:** Transport Canada
**Contact Information:**
Name: Anthony Senauth
Email: [anthony.senauth@tc.gc.ca](mailto:anthony.senauth@tc.gc.ca)
Phone: 204-590-8905
Address: 344 Edmonton Street, Winnipeg, MB R3B 2L4

**Proposal Documents:** The RFP document is available for download from the Government of Canada's tendering website at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/27/aa9b1a4219ca4be3589b5c2b7051a835/t5013220263_-_request_for_proposal.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/27/aa9b1a4219ca4be3589b5c2b7051a835/t5013220263_-_request_for_proposal.pdf).

**Trade Agreements:** The proposal is subject to the Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), and Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA).
